actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide facilities and equipment for additional storage space and laboratories at the National Seed Storage Laboratory at Fort Collins, Colorado.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations, not subject to fiscal year limitation, for the following improvements to be made by the Secretary of Agriculture, through the Agricultural Research Service, at the National Seed Storage Laboratory at Fort Collins, Colorado: (1) planning, construction, acquisition, alteration, and repair of buildings and equipment to provide additional storage space; and (2) renovation of existing facilities to provide laboratories.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to provide facilities and equipment for additional storage space and laboratories at the National Seed Storage Laboratory at Fort Collins, Colorado.
